chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has the above problem:

Hello, I have noticed very strong wear and tear on the camera at the casing.

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile 


Could you please do a partial refund of €60 because the customer didn't receive the product in the right grade?

Regards,
Ana from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare, 

We are truly sorry that we are not able to provide the customer with a satisfactory outcome. Hence, we have provided a 60 euros commercial gesture to the customer.

Regards,
JY
